message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you $300000 and keep $700000. You can do better in the next round, I'm sure!
Let's be fair and split it down the middle. We both get a good chunk of the money this way, and we can avoid any further risk of losing it!
You're not getting a free pass, Bob! I'll give you $400000, but I'm taking the lion's share. Don't expect any mercy from me!
